data.text: @JeremyGeorgeJG Hi, if you are trying to book the flight ticket and travel extras (extra baggage, prepaid seats etc) simultaneously you can try buying only the flight ticket first, and add extras later. Sometimes several charges at once can block the payment at the bank.

data.text:
@gemlouisetaylor Hi, I'm sorry to hear that the baggage is delayed. If you have received a file reference, please use Worldtracer to trace the baggage https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU - For assistance please call SAS baggage service, phone numbers are available at https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2

// Anton.

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @AlexandraJonson I'm sorry to hear that! If you contact SAS Baggage Service they should be able to help you, you can find their phone number here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2 If you are able, the delayed luggage can also be reported at the airport. Kind Regards, Natasha

@goodhill685 Hi! I'm afraid I do not know why you were not informed about this, or have a specific name for someone responsible, but I do want to apologize to you for the inconvenience.
Kind Regards, Natasha

@NerdSkier You need to check in the baggage tomorrow. The check in disk at Arlanda opens at 04:00. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

data.text:
@Elena68177240 If you are unable to contact Baggage Service via the number on our site I recommend calling Newark airport directly to see if they can forward you to them that way. You can also use your PIR-nr to track your luggage here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU 
Kind Regards, Natasha

data.text:
@jorgenborg Hi! Since the US no longer demands a negative test to enter the country, we do not demand them either. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@ElisabethRagnar Hej! Nej det är inte ändrat. Om du har en Plus-biljett så har du även tillgång till lounge och Fast Track. 
Vänliga hälsningar, Natasha

data.text:
@KWKentUK You can send in this form https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa to Customer Care and they will look at compensating you for the cost of the medical support if you need to get it via a private company in the UK. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

data.text:
@conductorben How quickly we get you rebooked can differ. If you still have not gotten a new alternative I recommend calling us so that we can help you manually find a different flight. You can find the phone number here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj  
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @JagCesar I recommend you call us so that we can help you reschedule the flight if the website is acting up. You can find our contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj and change the country you are contacting us from by changing the "Country/region" tab. Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@leon_eckervall Yes, you need to change it. You can contact our live-chat or call us to do this. You can find our contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj You can change the country you are contacting us from by changing the "Country/region" tab. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@sleevin_steven The points + cash tickets need to be bought on the website. If the issue is there I recommend clearing the browser cache, or trying again another day if that does not work. If it is a regular ticket we can help you book it if you call our customer service. Kind Regards, Natasha

@KWKentUK I'm afraid I cannot expedite the process from here. If you cannot reach SAS Baggage Service via the number you were provided I recommend you call Heathrow directly to see if they can forward you to the Baggage Service staff there. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

data.text: @Headhunter_Stk Hi! SAS has no covid rules of our own and hence we follow CDCs guidelines. Best regards, Rebecca

data.text: @goodhill685 Hi, you can file your claim for reimbursement and compensation at: https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa Unfortunately I do not have an answer as to why your bags will not arrive until tomorrow. Best regards, Rebecca

data.text: @Jjcc21S Hi, SAS has no rules or requirements of our own in regards to covid testing. Best regards, Rebecca
@_ShonFerguson Hi, bag drop at Arlanda opens at 03:45. You can check in your luggage 3 hours previous to your departure. Best regards, Rebecca

@SusanDelphine Hi Susan, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed luggage. You can trace your luggage using your PIR-number at: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU If you need to get in contact with ground handling you can find their number at: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2 Best regards, Rebecca

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @aka_felder Hi, I am sorry to hear your girlfriends luggage has been delayed. You can trace the luggage via: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU using your PIR-number. You can also contact our ground handling at Manchester airport at: 0151 495 9300 if you wish to speak to someone. Best Regards, Rebecca

@KWKentUK Hi, I'm sorry to hear your mothers luggage is delayed. If you have not yet, file a report for the delayed luggage via: https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x You can then trace the luggage via: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU You can also contact ground services at +44 3443754250 Best regards, Rebecca

data.text: @Sheamus Hi, I'm sorry to hear you're having issues with entering your passport details. Due to privacy reasons you can not update this information via live chat. Our phone representatives will gladly help you sort this issue and file an error report for you. Best regards, Rebecca
@MaxWilson1001 Hi Max, all flights are not visible on the public flight status page. Flight SK505 CPH-LHR is planned to depart as scheduled tomorrow. Best regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Delayed, Lost and Damaged Baggage
urls.description: We transport your baggage with care. But if your baggage has been delayed, lost or damaged for some reason, here you can find helpful information »

data.text: @goodhill685 Hi, I am sorry to hear about your lost luggage. You can trace your luggage via: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU using your PIR-number. You can read about your reimbursement and compensation rights at: https://t.co/KQdOdrH9TM Best regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Customer Claims
urls.description: If you’re filing a claim due to an unfortunate experience with us, you may be entitled to compensation.

data.text: @PaulChoquette8 Hi Paul, I'm sorry to hear about your accessibility issues. If it was related to SAS aircraft or service you can leave feedback with us at: https://t.co/xMt9zSrqJc If it was related to the general airport accessibility I recommend you contact Swedavia. Best regards, Rebecca

data.text: @eptuttle Hi! Unfortunately we are not able to merge bookings, however we can make a remark in your respective bookings that you are travelling together. For us to be able do to this, please contact us via live chat or phone: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Best regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @guenes78 Hi, please contact us via our live chat or through phone and we'll gladly help you look into this. You can find our live chat and contact information at: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Best regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text: @davidtaylor87 Hi David, hopefully you've had an update on your luggage by now. You are allowed to spend up to 75 EUR/person and day for necessities - please make sure to save all the receipts. You can then make your claim at: https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa Best regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @NadineBrown22 Hey, Im sorry for your delay flight. Please contact our live agent on chat or phone. Here can you find our contact information https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
@theNorthernGen3 Hey, Please contact the airport you land with if you miss your connection so we can assist you with finding an alternative for you. Best Regard Phonnicha

@davidtaylor87 Hey. If your baggage is delayed when traveling with SAS, you must report your missing baggage immediately at the airport, or through https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x . If you have already reported the missing baggage you can trace your baggage via this link: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU.

urls.title: SAS | Scandinavian Airlines – Book Your Next Flight on Flysas.com
urls.description: With SAS you are part of a community experiencing easy, joyful, and reliable services delivered the Scandinavian way – SAS Airlines makes your travel easier »

data.text: @Xalira Hey, there are no any ticket  left on this flight, but we have another direct flight on 3th jul. Please visit our webbsite https://t.co/BlgfvicYhk for help with find other flight schedule . Best Regard Phonnicha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@PrywerekRenata Hi! I am sorry to hear the trouble with reaching us. 
You can also contact us by our Live chat to get further help seeing the rules for your booking and to receive rebooking help.
You find our contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best regards, Angelica

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@RaysonDiaz Hi!
In case of missing your flight, you can speak further of this with the staff at the Airport. I also recommend you to contact us by our Live chat or phone to look more into your booking.
Find our contact information here:https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best regards, Angelica

@CoffeeDeb13 Hi!
I recommend you to report your baggage missing here: https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x , you will then be able to trace your bag to see the status.
You find all the different numbers for Baggage Service through this link: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM.
Best regards, Angelica

I am sorry to hear that you have not yet received an answer to your complaint. I recommend you to contact us by our Live chat, Messenger or by phone to look further into the status of your case.
Find our contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Best regards, Angelica

urls.title: Kontakta oss – Hitta ditt lokala telefonnummer
urls.description: Om du behöver kontakta oss hittar du lokala telefonnummer till kundservice, SAS Corporate Sales Center och SAS Group Sales här »

data.text:
@btsbiebes Just nu har vi flera flyg som ska flyga till England som planerat den 2 juli, så ja, det kan ni. Om du har en specifik bokning du undrar över, rekommenderar jag att du ringer in till oss eller kontaktar våran live-chatt här: https://t.co/z4gOZAAJQJ 
Vänliga hälsningar, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@dan_hat93 I would recommend contacting our Customer Service again to get to the bottom of this. You can find the phone number to our Customer Service as well as our live chat if you follow this link: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@samanthahardim8 In that case, I would recommend going back to the airport to report the delayed baggage if you have the possibility to do so. You could also try calling the airport to see if they can put you through to Baggage Service that way. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@gnvffsvpremacy Anledningen till att det är bra att checka in online även om man lämnar väskorna vid en bemannad disk är att det snabbar på processen på plats. Personalen behöver då ej gå igenom alla steg för att först checka in er, utan kan fokusera på bagaget. 
Vänliga hälsningar, Natasha

data.text:
@stwff The information you give should be correct. At the same time there are no requirements for the passport to be valid after the trip. Based on this, it should be no issue travelling, but it is ultimately the staff at the airport that make the final check. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@ERMomof3boys You can use this link: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU to track your luggage using the PIR number you got when you reported it as delayed. You can also find all phone numbers we have for Baggage Service at different airports via this link: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@samanthahardim8 Hi, if you have not yet registered your bag at the airport when you landed, you can register a delayed bag online on this link: https://t.co/uHX1YFCLU3
Kind regards, Rebecka

@gnvffsvpremacy Bagagetaggarna behöver skrivas ut av personalen som finns på plats, ej genom via self-service maskinen. Jag hoppas att detta löste sig! 
Vänliga hälsningar, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Roasty__Toasty By following this link: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj you can find our live chat and the phone number to our Customer Service. You can change where you are calling from by changing "Country/region". If you contact us there we will be able to help you further. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@natanwardum I recommend you call us or contact our live chat so that we can take a closer look at what could have happened here. You can find the phone number to Customer Service and the live chat via this link: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@lizzie63023697 If you do not have the boarding pass, it is okay to send in the form without it. You can send in a picture of a blank piece of paper instead of the boarding pass. Just make sure all of the other required information is filled in. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Customer Claims
urls.description: If you’re filing a claim due to an unfortunate experience with us, you may be entitled to compensation.

data.text:
@ERMomof3boys I want to apologize for the inconvenience due to the delayed luggage and that you have had to wait for it to be delivered. I would recommend you Contact our Customer Care department to look over compensation for this via this link: https://t.co/xMt9zSrqJc 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@elboy1980 För våra resor kan ni checka in bagaget 2-3 timmar innan flygets avgång. Så det går alltså inte att checka in bagaget dagen innan. 
Vänliga hälsningar, Natasha

@icegirl_2 The connection time ensures the checked in baggage will have time to move from one flight to the next, and without any unexpected delays (for example long lines) it should also be enough for the passengers. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@hariontwitt No, we do not allow personal alcohol on our flights. However, alcohol is available for purchase on them.  
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@roshanpatel___ SAS GO Light does not include overhead carry on luggage, only an underseat bag. You can contact our Customer Service here https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj  so that they can take a closer look at your booking to confirm what kind of luggage you can bring. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@KlyngeC Hi, I am sorry to hear you've waited so long for your claim. Please contact our customer service so we can look into this for you and assist you in the best possible way. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@DavidLascelles Hi, I am terribly sorry to hear this happened. Please contact our customer service for looking into the alternatives we have for you. I also recommend you to make a claim with our customer care department for further assistance: https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa
Kind regards, Rebecka

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text:
@samanthahardim8 Hi! This is the phone number we have for London Heathrow's baggage service:  +44 344 3754250 You can also track your bag with your PIR number here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@elsacariello Hi, I am sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. You can contact our customer service by live chat as well to receive assistance looking at options. You can find our live chat here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@jquelinedalunde Hi! You can check with the airport staff on what is available for you when you are checking in your baggage, however it is not something I can promise in advance as it depends on the availability at the airport at the time you are flying.
Kind regards, Rebecka

@dawnmallia Hi! Check in online is available from 30 hours before the departure. If the check in has opened and you are experiencing issues checking in for all of your flights, you will need to sort this out at the airport at a manned check in counter.
Kind regards, Rebecka

@nirav32419008 Hi! You can track your bag here: https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU and if you need to contact the airport for further information, you can find the phone number to the baggage service here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@lizzie63023697 Hi, You can apply for a compensation via our customer care department here: https://t.co/cXegpq56aG
Kind regards, Bahare

@HaukWahl Hi, I'm sorry you didn't receive your bags. You must report missing baggage here https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x if you haven't done this at the airport. You can track your baggage here https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU or contact baggage service here https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM 
Kinds regards. Bahare

@dairyqueenleen Hi, I'm sorry she didn't receive your bags. She must report missing baggage here https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x if she haven't done this at the airport. She can track her baggage here https://t.co/2zwsPbhQFU or contact baggage service here https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM 
Kinds regards. Bahare

urls.title: SAS | Scandinavian Airlines – Book Your Next Flight on Flysas.com
urls.description: With SAS you are part of a community experiencing easy, joyful, and reliable services delivered the Scandinavian way – SAS Airlines makes your travel easier »

data.text:
@leolisboa Hi,
Please contact our baggage service on the airport that your baggage was lost. You can find the correct number via this link:

https://t.co/We1FdD8x8k

Feel free to contact us on livechat on our website or call us

https://t.co/Blgfvidw6S

Best regards,
Marcus

@miniflickers Hi,
It is for one piece only.

Best regards,
Marcus

urls.title: Tidsfrister för incheckning och ombordstigning – Kom till flygplatsen i tid
urls.description: Försäkra dig om att du har tid för incheckning, bagageavlämning och säkerhetskontrollen. Tidsfristen kan variera beroende på biljettyp och medlemskapsnivå »

data.text:
@MagnusElmgren Hej Magnus,
Incheckningen för bagage öppnar 2-3 timmar innan flygets avgång. Mer information om incheckningstider hittar du här:

https://t.co/P4q3qgtuh9

Med vänlig hälsning,
Marcus

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@ingvildrm Hej!
Om vi ställt in ett flyg och du ej fått nya alternativ får du gärna kontakta oss via livechatt eller ringa in till oss.

För kompensation ber jag dig skicka in till vår kundvårdsavdelning så hjälper dom dig vidare.

https://t.co/kDAXvXUXIa

Med vänlig hälsning,
Marcus

urls.title: Manage My Bookings and Flights
urls.description: Log in with your booking reference (5-6 characters) and your last name to see all the details about your flights and manage your bookings »

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@BC91518941 Hi,
SK1622 is not cancelled. Please check your booking on our website since the app might display the wrong information.
https://t.co/yZoPBVnDMr

If you have other questions regarding your flight please contact us via chat or phone
https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 

Best regards,
Marcus

@stefanlillback Hej! Om du förköper eller väljer en plats i förväg som är vid gången så blir du placerad på en gångplats. Skulle det ske ändringar på din resa så vi kan hjälpa dig på bästa sätt med din platsreservation om du kontaktar vår Customer service.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka
